actor_awards.notes: She starred in 17 films before becoming a top draw in Las Vegas and television. Her TV specials won 6 Emmy Awards.

filmography.title: My Blue Heaven
filmography.role_description: A talented performer who, along with her partner, navigates the world of radio and television while trying to start a family; Gaynor's film debut.
filmography.plot: A radio star couple tries to adopt a child, but their busy showbiz lives complicate the process.

filmography.title: Take Care of My Little Girl
filmography.role_description: A cynical, fun-loving sorority sister who befriends the disillusioned protagonist.
filmography.plot: A college freshman becomes disillusioned with the snobbery and cruelty of the sorority system.

filmography.title: Golden Girl
filmography.role_description: The real-life 19th-century entertainer who sings and dances her way through the Civil War era to become a star.
filmography.plot: A musical biopic of Lotta Crabtree, a famous entertainer during the American Civil War and Gold Rush days.

filmography.title: We're Not Married!
filmography.role_description: A young wife who discovers her marriage is invalid just as she is about to enter a beauty contest.
filmography.plot: Five couples discover that they are not legally married because the justice of the peace who performed their ceremonies did not have a valid license.

filmography.title: Bloodhounds of Broadway
filmography.role_description: A hillbilly girl who comes to New York City and becomes a Broadway sensation with her dancing.
filmography.plot: A bookie adopts an orphan girl from the backwoods and tries to turn her into a Broadway star.

filmography.title: The I Don't Care Girl
filmography.role_description: The famous vaudeville star known for her energetic performances and signature song.
filmography.plot: A musical biopic about the life and career of Eva Tanguay, one of the most famous vaudeville performers of the early 20th century.

filmography.title: Down Among the Sheltering Palms
filmography.role_description: An island girl in the South Pacific who charms the American occupying forces.
filmography.plot: Two American officers stationed in the South Pacific try to fraternize with the local women despite strict regulations.

filmography.title: Three Young Texans
filmography.role_description: A tomboyish ranch girl who gets involved in a train robbery to save her father.
filmography.plot: A cowboy robs a train to prevent his father from doing it, but his friends think he has turned bad.

filmography.title: There's No Business Like Show Business
filmography.role_description: A talented and ambitious singer who joins a family vaudeville act and wins the heart of the son (Donald O'Connor).
filmography.plot: The children of a husband-and-wife vaudeville team begin to go their own ways, with one son falling for a rising star.

filmography.title: The Birds and the Bees
filmography.role_description: A charming card sharp who targets a naive millionaire but falls in love with him.
filmography.plot: A con woman targets a wealthy but clumsy heir on a cruise ship, in this musical remake of 'The Lady Eve'.

filmography.title: Anything Goes
filmography.role_description: A leading lady who is unknowingly signed by two different partners for a Broadway show.
filmography.plot: Two entertainers agree to perform in a Broadway show together but accidentally sign two different leading ladies, leading to hijinks on an ocean liner.

filmography.title: The Joker Is Wild
filmography.role_description: A chorus girl who marries comedian Joe E. Lewis (Frank Sinatra) and struggles with his alcoholism and mob ties.
filmography.plot: The story of Joe E. Lewis, a singer who refused to kowtow to the mob, survived a brutal attack, and returned to show business as a comedian.

filmography.title: Les Girls
filmography.role_description: One of three showgirls in a dance troupe whose differing recollections of their time in Paris lead to a libel suit.
filmography.plot: Three former showgirls recount their time with a dance troupe in Paris, each telling a conflicting version of events during a libel trial.

filmography.title: South Pacific
filmography.role_description: A naive Navy nurse stationed in the South Pacific who struggles with her prejudice while falling for a French plantation owner.
filmography.plot: On a South Pacific island during World War II, love blooms between a young nurse and a secretive Frenchman who's being courted for a dangerous military mission.

filmography.title: Happy Anniversary
filmography.role_description: A wife whose marriage is thrown into chaos when her husband reveals a secret to her parents on their anniversary.
filmography.plot: A husband accidentally reveals to his in-laws that he and his wife were intimate before they were married, causing a domestic crisis.

filmography.title: Surprise Package
filmography.role_description: A beautiful 'surprise package' sent to an exiled gangster (Yul Brynner) on a Greek island.
filmography.plot: An American gangster deported to a Greek island plots to steal the crown jewels of a deposed king.

filmography.title: For Love or Money
filmography.role_description: A woman who becomes the target of a wealthy widow's matchmaking scheme involving a lawyer (Kirk Douglas).
filmography.plot: A widow hires a lawyer to matchmake for her three daughters, but one of them falls for the lawyer instead.

filmography.title: Mitzi
filmography.role_description: The first of her acclaimed television specials, showcasing her singing, dancing, and comedic talents.
filmography.plot: A musical variety special featuring Mitzi Gaynor in various song and dance numbers.

filmography.title: Mitzi's Second Special
filmography.role_description: Her follow-up special featuring elaborate costumes and choreography.
filmography.plot: Mitzi Gaynor returns with another hour of music, dance, and comedy sketches.

filmography.title: Mitzi... The First Time
filmography.role_description: A spectacular television special that highlighted her Las Vegas showmanship.
filmography.plot: A variety special featuring Mitzi Gaynor performing hits and comedy routines.

filmography.title: Mitzi... A Tribute to the American Housewife
filmography.role_description: A thematic special dedicated to the American housewife, featuring skits and songs.
filmography.plot: Mitzi Gaynor salutes the American housewife through music and comedy.

filmography.title: Mitzi... and a Hundred Guys
filmography.role_description: A lavish special featuring a chorus of one hundred male dancers and singers.
filmography.plot: Mitzi Gaynor performs with a cast of one hundred men in this musical extravaganza.

filmography.title: Mitzi... Roarin' in the 20's
filmography.role_description: A nostalgic special celebrating the music and style of the 1920s.
filmography.plot: Mitzi Gaynor takes a musical journey back to the Roaring Twenties.

filmography.title: Mitzi... Zings Into Spring
filmography.role_description: A spring-themed variety show featuring Bob Hope as a guest star.
filmography.plot: Mitzi Gaynor celebrates the arrival of spring with song and dance.

filmography.title: Mitzi... What's Hot, What's Not
filmography.role_description: Her final major network special, exploring trends and pop culture through music.
filmography.plot: Mitzi Gaynor takes a comedic and musical look at current trends and fads.
